title: Fuse
fullText:
Where the marking of the fuse base does not correctly indicate the rating of the associated fuse-element, the rating of the fuse-element shall be marked either on an exposed non-detachable portion of the fuse or on its enclosing case, or on the switchboard adjacent to the fuse.
A number of fuses may be marked as a group, instead of independent marking adjacent to each fuse, whereâ€”
(a)	each fuse-element is of identical rating; and
(b)	the fuses are mounted adjacent to each other.
